      • linkMatch

        public void linkMatch(MatchCache match)
        Links the given match cache to this cache. No link in the other direction will be initiated.
        Parameters:
        match - The attachment cache to link
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - If the cache is invalid

      • unlinkMatch

        public boolean unlinkMatch(MatchCache match)
        Unlinks the given match cache from this cache. This will not invalidate the given cache. The link in the other direction will persist.
        Parameters:
        match - The match cache to remove
        Returns:
        Whether the given cache was linked to this cache
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - If the cache is invalid
